alert.note: Alert for Henry; Rock Island; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 08 at 10:03AM CDT until August 11 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Quad Cities IA IL has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Illinois... Rock River near Joslin affecting Whiteside, Rock Island and Henry IL Counties. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Rock River near Joslin. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Water affects low lying agricultural land. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 6.5 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening.
